siteMetadata.title: Team
siteMetadata.description: Мы предлагаем не только отличную заработную плату и гибкие условия, но и прекрасную миссию, команду и время на создание чего-то принципиально нового.

hero.title: Мы создаем Joystream, чтобы дать ему свободу
hero.subtitle: Команда Jsgenesis является ядром, которое разрабатывает Joystream - платформу на блокчейне с открытым исходным кодом.

foundingMembers.title: Meet the people who launched Joystream
foundingMembers.subtitle: Joystream was launched by people working in the entity <linkOne>Jsgenesis</linkOne> and to a highly committed subset of the community which participated through many test networks as part of the <linkTwo>founding member program</linkTwo>.

jsgenesis.title: Jsgenesis
jsgenesis.modal: Jsgenesis is the founding team and platform development partner set up as a structure to help develop and set up the autonomous operation of Joystream DAO. Its focus has been on developing the apps and processes to build and train the team of founding members and support the community on the path to autonomy and self-organization.

community.title: Community
community.modal: Joystream is built by a strongly committed community of highly skilled founding members, responsible for technical infrastructure maintenance, DAO operations management and all aspects contributing to the growth of the Joystream platform.

investors.title: A team effort recognized and trusted by over 40 investors

auditors.title: Joystream blockchain audited by top Substrate auditors
